snippet: A backdrop of the four-game series between the Orioles and Yankees is the history Buck Showalter, Baltimore’s manager, has with the Bronx Bombers.
abstract: Bill Pennington On Baseball column observes that a backdrop of the four-game series between the Baltimore Orioles and New York Yankees is that Orioles manager Buck Showalter came up through the New York Yankees organization.
lead_paragraph: A backdrop of the four-game series between the Orioles and Yankees is the history Buck Showalter, Baltimore’s manager, has with the Bronx Bombers.

headline.seo: Buck Showalter Has Orioles in Position to Pass Yankees
headline.main: In Opposite Dugout, Reminders of Showalter’s Past
headline.print_headline: In Opposite Dugout, Reminders of Showalter’s Past
